org.araneaframework.http.core
Class StandardServletOutputData

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.http.core.StandardServletOutputData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Extendable, HttpOutputData, Narrowable, OutputData
public class StandardServletOutputData
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpOutputData

A implementation of ServletOutputData, MimeOutputData and ServletOverridableOutputData using StandardPath for scoping.

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer"
